dcterms:description: A dataset of 5,000 Chest X-ray images prepared for COVID-19 detection. It includes 184 COVID-19 images and 3,000 non-COVID images from the ChexPert dataset. The images were labeled by a board-certified radiologist.
dcterms:title: COVID-Xray-5k

dcterms:creator: Joseph Paul Cohen
dcterms:description: A dataset containing chest X-ray and CT images of COVID-19 patients. The dataset is continuously updated and includes metadata about patients such as sex and age.
dcterms:title: COVID-Chestxray-Dataset

dcterms:description: A large dataset of chest X-ray images labeled for 14 different thoracic pathology classes. It is used as a source for non-COVID samples in the COVID-Xray-5k dataset.
dcterms:title: ChexPert
